title: Members proxies
context: ยง431:4-312 Members proxies. (a) A member of a domestic mutual insurer may vote in person or by proxy given another member on any matter coming before a corporate meeting of members. (b) No proxy shall be valid beyond the earlier of the following dates: (1) The date of expiration set forth in the proxy; (2) The date of termination of membership; or (3) Five years from the date of execution of the proxy. &copy; No member&rsquo;s vote upon any proposal to divest the insurer of its business and assets, or the major part thereof, shall be registered or taken except in person or by a proxy newly executed and specific as to the matter to be voted upon. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
